message_:
Nurses can be proud of being providing nursing care as extended by Bibi Fatima Tuz Zohra (R.A) and other pious shabiyat in the battle field of Auhad and during other Ghazwat. Nursing profession is important pillar of health care system. Its role is expanding day by day. Pakistan needs highly skilled nurses in sufficient numbers to deliver health care to clients shoulder to shoulder with the doctors. With the passage of time, nursing profession has gained tremendous importance. Now this realization has dawned on the policy makers all over the world that no single profession can cope with the burden of disease and inaccessible health care delivery system. Over and above all this, is escalating health care costs and iniquitous distribution of health care work force. Nurses can bring in a positive revolution in the health care delivery system of this province.

\xa0

Therefore, it is the vision of Institute to produce highly qualified and skilled Nurses in sufficient numbers that every household in the fare flung areas of this province have round the clock access to nurse. The Students nurses on one hand are meeting the deficiency of nurses as concern nurses Patient ratio and Nurses-bed ratio and on the other hand they are filling the gaps of absence of pharmacists in the line of patient care, thus affecting their training of Nursing care of Patient so nursing students are advised to attain all competencies required for a nurse as given their curriculum. The hard work and dedication is the key towards success and towards bright future in Pakistan and abroad. The Institute is working hard to provide them with enabling environment of academic activities. The Institute will ultimately run the BSc Nursing four years Program and LHV two years.

\xa0

The transition from diploma to degree program is the need of the day, Legend United Medical And Allied Health Sciences Sehwan Sharif\xa0has taken this initiative in the district to facilitate the population to equip them with standard of nursing education. I wish bright future to the students.\xa0Thank You

It is great pleasure and pride for me to announce that we have launched a new medical institute with the name of “Legend United Medical And Allied Health Sciences Sehwan Sharif ”. Medical is noble profession in since of duty in practices to treat humanity. We have demonstrated our willingness and readiness to bring talented students in future. . I would be pleased we welcome you to Legend United Medical And Allied Health Sciences Sehwan Sharif. We would delegate to involve the students in educations to foster their value. Thank You
